mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate of David Owen, His heirs and Beneficiaries.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate of David Owen, His heirs and Beneficiaries. John P. Short, Administrator, Trustee for David Owen's Heirs W. H. Morgan, Commissioner of Accounts, who settled the David Owen estate Recorded in Ledger Book 2, page 195, in Floyd County Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
